metadata.name: Forever Is Now
metadata.description:
The first international art exhibition at the Pyramids of Giza and it's surrounding plateau in 4500 years! 

Reflecting the global influence of ancient Egypt and the inclusiveness of contemporary cultural practices. Whether exercised by ancient Egyptians or contemporary artists, making art permits one generation to speak to the next. 

An unrelenting undertaking that reflects humankind’s talent for creating works that inspire the imagination and stir the emotions that are called ‘wonders’ — works that reveal the marvel of humanity itself and, through the arts, its unity.


Token Utilities:
- 2 VIP passes to Forever Is Now II Private View & Cocktail (29.10.22) 
- 2 VIP passes to Forever Is Now II cultural program (28 - 31.10.22)
- Forever Is Now Merchandise
